name: Lorb of Gorb
description:
THERE IS NO LORB OF GORB

Or so they say...

As a Gorb Wielder, arrange an infinite series of marble-like beings to form spells and defeat enemies!

- Puzzle/RPG hybrid gameplay!

- Over a dozen items with hundreds of synergies!

Instructions: 

Use the mouse to select and move Gorbs. When you end your turn, Gorbs in the upper panel will be cast as a spell, and those below will interact, transforming based on their configuration. It's up to you to use them to your advantage!

CREDITS:

Art, Design, Writing, Programming by Ethan Goldreyer

Royalty free music courtesy of Ryini Beats

Additional music by Kai Keys and Josh Goldreyer
